name: Steve Yacovelli

what_you_do: Steve Yacovelli is a speaker and consultant specializing in leadership, change management, and organizational culture.

current_projects: Upcoming workshops on leadership and change management strategies.
bio: Certified Speaking Professional (CSP), featured in various industry publications, and has a strong following on social media.
